snippet: BARASH--Carolyn. A true matriarch; beautiful strong and loving. Our hearts go out to our dear friends, Jane and Richard, Barbara, and the entire family. With love, Maura and Joel 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARASH--Carolyn. A true matriarch; beautiful strong and loving. Our hearts go out to our dear friends, Jane and Richard, Barbara, and the entire family. With love, Maura and Joel 1/3
